reviewText: My granddaughter loves it. She is 22 months old.
Its a short , basic array of videos images. Average or below expectations.
Our 6 year old daughter loves this.
My son loves the videos. I only wish that the songs had English subtitles so that my husband and son could understand it as it went along
This is easy to follow and simple visuals that my 3 year old enjoys and it keeps his attention.  Highly recommended.

It's perfect!  Our baby (1 year old) loves it and so do we.  We have a couple of other learning-Chinese DVDs, but none of those hold his attention like Baby Learns Chinese.  He loves watching this DVD from beginning to end.  We love how it uses common children's songs that he already enjoys in English, so that they readily grab his attention and he makes the connection between the two languages. The DVD is helping mom learn Chinese too!
